title: Hailey Bieber finally showed us her wedding dress, and her veil is truly next-level
text:
Last Monday, September 30th, Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin became husband and wife (for the second time). The two had already been legally married for a year, but they celebrated their one-year anniversary with a religious ceremony and banging reception in South Carolina. Photos from the event have been pretty scant. But finally, Hailey Bieber uploaded a photo of her wedding dress to Instagram, and her veil is the next-level ish we were expecting.

According to Hailey’s caption, her lace, off-the-shoulder dress was designed by Virgil Abloh, head designer and Chief Executive Officer of the Off-White brand.

undefined

Abloh also uploaded pics of the final product on October 7th. He wrote in his Instagram caption, “when @haileybieber asks if you want to design a wedding dress… that’s a ‘yes’ too. love you guys since time, for time.”

It wouldn’t be a Bieber wedding without an over-the-top element. So, Abloh embroidered “Till Death Do Us Part” on Hailey’s veil.

“last Monday was the most special day of my life:)” Hailey captioned her veil pic.

Abloh even uploaded the design sketch to show us how the dress transformed from idea to finished product.

And Hailey also showed off that massive rock Justin gave her more than a year ago.

Who needs vows when you can embroider a veil? We have a feeling Hailey Bieber and Virgil Abloh may have just started a new trend, and TBH, we’re here for the extra-ness.
description: Hailey Bieber just shared photos of her designer wedding dress on Instagram and OMG — the embroidered veil is everything.
